Manx: Faagail Mannin ayns 1863
English: Leaving Mannin in 1863

Manx: Ta mee faagail nish çheer my ghooie
English: I am now leaving my native land
Diplomatic: Tha mee faagaill nish cheeyr my ghoaie

Manx: Yn Ellan veg t’ayns mean y cheayn
English: The little Island in the middle of the sea
Diplomatic: Yn Ellan veg t’ayns mean y cheayn

Manx: Harrish yn faarkey lhean dy roie
English: To sail over the wide ocean
Diplomatic: Harrish yn faarkey lheayn dy roie

Manx: Veih caarjyn deyr as Mannin Veen
English: From dear dear friends and Dear Mannin
Diplomatic: Veih caarjyn deyr as Mannin Veen

Manx: Goll dy rouail ny lomarcan
English: Going to wander alone
Diplomatic: Gholl dy rouaill ny lomarkyn

Manx: Foddey voish ooilley bynney lhiam
English: Far from all I loved most
Diplomatic: Foddey voish ooilley bynney lhiam

Manx: My yeir ta shilley sheese dy myn
English: My tears are falling down in pieces
Diplomatic: My yeir tra shilley sheese dy myn

Manx: Agh gerjagh arragh cha vel aym
English: But I have no more comfort
Diplomatic: Agh gherjagh arragh cha vel aym

Manx: Slane eu my huyraghyn as braar
English: So long my sisters and brother
Diplomatic: Slane eu my huiraghyn as brayr

Manx: Slane eu, slane eu, my ainjysee
English: So long, so long, my acquantances
Diplomatic: Slane eu slane eu my ainjysee

Manx: Slane eu, slane eu, my Voir as Ayr
English: So long, so long my Mother and Father
Diplomatic: Slane eu slane eu my Voir as Ayr

Manx: Foast ta shiu faggys da my chree
English: You are yet close to my heart
Diplomatic: Foast ta shiu faghys da my chree

Manx: Agh ish ta slane my hee er stroie
English: But she was has completely destroyed my peace
Diplomatic: Agh ish ta slane my hee er stroie

Manx: Nish faagit foddey er my chooyl
English: Now left far behind me
Diplomatic: Nish fagyt foddey er my chooyl

Manx: As nish ayns siyr dy chosney voee
English: And now in a hurry to get away from her
Diplomatic: As nish ayns siyr dy chostney voie

Manx: Ayns faasaghyn yn seihll dy hooyl
English: To walk in the wildernesses of the world
Diplomatic: Ayns faasaghyn yn seihll dy hooyl

Manx: Nish ta ny sleityn foddey jeh
English: Now the mountains are far off
Diplomatic: Nish ta ny sleityn foddey jeh

Manx: Marish dagh nhee ta deyr da’n chree
English: With every thing that is dear to the heart
Diplomatic: Marish dagh nhee ta deyr da’n chree

Manx: Ayns seaghyn nish dy cheau yn traa
English: To spend the time in sorrow
Diplomatic: Ayns seaghyn nish dy cheau yn tra

Manx: As gyn ny sodjey fakin ee
English: And not see her any longer
Diplomatic: As gyn ny sodjey fakin ee

Manx: O Vannin veen foast ta my yier
English: O dear Mannin my tears still
Diplomatic: O Vannin veen foast ta my yier

Manx: Ec smooinnaght ort roie sheese my oaie
English: When thinking of you, run down my face
Diplomatic: Eck smooinnagh ort roie sheese my oie

Manx: Agh ish ta geiyrt mee voish my heer
English: But she who drives me from my country
Diplomatic: Agh ish ta giyrt mee voish my heer

Manx: Ta er hoiagh beg jeh slane my ghraih
English: Who has despised all of my love
Diplomatic: Ta’r hoiagh beg jeh slane my graih

Manx: Slane ayd ven foalsey son dy braa
English: So long false woman forever
Diplomatic: Slane ayd ven foalsey son dy braa

Manx: Cha jeanyms arragh paagey oo
English: I will not ever kiss you again
Diplomatic: Cha jeanyms arragh paagey oo

Manx: Ga dy bee’m deinagh ceau my hraa
English: Although I will be weary spending my time
Diplomatic: Gha dy beem deighnagh cheau my hraa

Manx: Nee’m streeu gyn smooinaght ort ny smoo
English: I will strive not to think of you anymore.
Diplomatic: Nym straeu gyn sooinniaght ort ny smoo

Manx: Agh ga nagh jean mayd reesht meeiteil
English: But although we will not meet again
Diplomatic: Agh ga nagh jean mayd reesht meetteill

Manx: Syn astyer fo yn villey mooar
English: In the afternoon under the big tree
Diplomatic: Syn astyer fo yn vhilley mooar

Manx: Ny-yeih nee ish as mish failleil
English: Nevertheless she and I will fail
Diplomatic: Ny-yeih nee ish as mish falleeil

Manx: As lhie dy chadley ayns yn ooir
English: And lie down to sleep in the soil
Diplomatic: As lhie dy chadley ayns yn ooir

Manx: Farquhar
English: Farquhar
Diplomatic: Farquhar
